about_the_game:
A set of swimwear perfect for some fun in the sun.

Alisa's Swimsuit x 1
Laura's Swimsuit x 1
Emma's Swimsuit x 1
Fie's Swimsuit x 1
Juna's Swimsuit x 1
Juna's Sporty Sunglasses x 1
Altina's Swimsuit x 1
Altina's Straw Hat x 1
Musse's Swimsuit x 1
Sara's Swimsuit x 1

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
